attributes.action: Replace the Union Jack with the national flag of England
attributes.additional_details:
For the English peoples it is hard to see our once great National flag cast aside by the flag of the United Kingdom. I put forward this petition in a time of uncertainty while Scotland attempts to end its bond with the Union. While I am patriotic of the United Kingdom I feel that the nation of England and its flag have been lost in History.

Let the Scottish fly their flag, let the Welsh fly their flag and let the English fly our flag!
